note:
I believe I know the source of all the world's problems and how to solve them.

How to Solve All the World's Problems: Responsibility. Responsibility is doing what works for you and makes you happy. The responsible should only tolerate the irresponsible as much as works for the responsible. Those who don’t show basic consideration don’t deserve basic consideration. The more responsible the world becomes, the less excusable irresponsibility becomes. Life is just.
